turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, can you get me a coffee from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! Which Starbucks are you planning on going to?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, I'll be going to the one on Memorial Parkway in Huntsville, Alabama. I am going to a meeting there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a Caramel Machiatto please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I can do that. Do you want to add anything to it? It has milk, espresso, vanilla syrup and a little caramel syrup topping on the regular method.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, sounds delicious. But, I would like to have one less pump of vanilla in it, or it's a bit too sweet for me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Do you want it hot or cold?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Definitely hot. It's too cold for an iced one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. What size would you like? They have short, Tall, Grande and Venti?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's go with a Grande. I need a big boost of caffeine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, do you need it soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like to have it ready in 20 minutes please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Anything else, a roll or croissant?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks. But, can you make sure they add some whipped topping to it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Absolutely!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How much is it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will be $5.65.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great! I'm ready for it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Well, it will be ready to pick up at Starbucks Memorial Parkway in 20 minutes!
